trans-unit.source: Represents one table of in-memory data.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en tabell med data i minnet.

trans-unit.source: The DataTable is a central object in the ADO.NET library.
trans-unit.target: DataTable er en sentral objekt i ADO.NET-biblioteket.

trans-unit.source: Other objects that use the DataTable include the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> and the <xref:System.Data.DataView>.
trans-unit.target: Andre objekter som bruker DataTable inkluderer <xref:System.Data.DataSet>og <xref:System.Data.DataView>.</xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: When accessing DataTable objects, note that they are conditionally case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at de er betinget bokstaver under tilgang til DataTable objekter.

trans-unit.source: For example, if one DataTable is named "mydatatable" and another is named "Mydatatable", a string used to search for one of the tables is regarded as case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis én DataTable kalles "mydatatable" og en annen er "Mydatatable", en streng som brukes til å søke etter én av tabellene, anses som bokstaver.

trans-unit.source: However, if "mydatatable" exists and "Mydatatable" does not, the search string is regarded as case insensitive.
trans-unit.target: Men hvis finnes "mydatatable" og "Mydatatable" ikke anses søkestrengen som bokstaver.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.DataSet> can contain two DataTable objects that have the same <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> property value but different <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Namespace%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Data.DataSet>kan inneholde to DataTable-objekter som har samme <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>egenskapsverdien men forskjellige <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Namespace%2A>egenskapsverdier.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.Namespace%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: For more information about working with DataTable objects, see [Creating a DataTable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om hvordan du arbeider med DataTable-objekter, se [oppretter en DataTable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If you are creating a DataTable programmatically, you must first define its schema by adding <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> objects to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection> (accessed through the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Columns%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du oppretter en DataTable programmatisk, må du først definere tilhørende skjema ved å legge til <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>objekter til den <xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection>(tilgjengelig via den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Columns%2A>egenskapen).</xref:System.Data.DataTable.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn>

trans-unit.source: For more information about adding <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> objects, see [Adding Columns to a DataTable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om å legge til <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>objekter, se [å legge til kolonner til en DataTable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Data.DataColumn>

trans-unit.source: To add rows to a DataTable, you must first use the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A> method to return a new <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil legge til rader i DataTable, må du først bruke den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A>metode til å returnere en ny <xref:System.Data.DataRow>objektet.</xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A> method returns a row with the schema of the DataTable, as it is defined by the table's <xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A>Metoden returnerer en rad med skjemaet til DataTable, slik den er definert av tabellens <xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of rows that a DataTable can store is 16,777,216.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall rader som DataTable kan lagre er 16,777,216.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Adding Data to a DataTable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [tillegging av Data til en DataTable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The DataTable also contains a collection of <xref:System.Data.Constraint> objects that can be used to ensure the integrity of the data.
trans-unit.target: DataTable også inneholder en samling av <xref:System.Data.Constraint>objekter som kan brukes til å sikre integriteten til dataene.</xref:System.Data.Constraint>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [DataTable Constraints](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [DataTable begrensninger](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: There are many DataTable events that can be used to determine when changes are made to a table.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes mange DataTable hendelser som kan brukes til å bestemme når det gjøres endringer i en tabell.

trans-unit.source: These include <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanged>, <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging>, <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowDeleting>, and <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowDeleted>.
trans-unit.target: Disse omfatter <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanged>, <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging>, <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowDeleting>, og <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowDeleted>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowDeleted> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowDeleting> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the events that can be used with a DataTable, see [Handling DataTable Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelser som kan brukes med en DataTable [behandler DataTable hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: When an instance of DataTable is created, some of the read/write properties are set to initial values.
trans-unit.target: Når det opprettes en forekomst av DataTable, settes enkelte egenskaper som lese-og skrivetilgang til opprinnelige verdier.

trans-unit.source: For a list of these values, see the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> constructor topic.
trans-unit.target: En liste over disse verdiene i den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>konstruktøren emnet.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Data.DataSet> and DataTable objects inherit from <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent>, and support the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface for .NET Framework remoting.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I <xref:System.Data.DataSet>og DataTable objekter arver fra <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent>, og støtte av <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>grensesnitt for .NET Framework ekstern kommunikasjon.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: These are the only ADO.NET objects that you can use for .NET Framework remoting.
trans-unit.target: Dette er de bare ADO.NET-objektene som du kan bruke for .NET Framework ekstern kommunikasjon.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> class with no arguments.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> klasse uten noen argumenter.

trans-unit.source: The constructor sets initial values for all properties of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren angir opprinnelige verdier for alle egenskaper for det <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objektet.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the properties and their default values.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser egenskapene og standardverdiene.

trans-unit.source: When an instance of <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is created, the following read/write properties are set to initial values.
trans-unit.target: Når en forekomst av <xref:System.Data.DataTable>er opprettet, følgende lese-og skrivetilgang er angitt til opprinnelige verdier.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Default value| |--------------|-------------------| |**CaseSensitive**|Same as the parent <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, if it belongs to one.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdien | |--------------|-------------------| | **Små/store bokstaver**| Samme som overordnet <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, hvis den tilhører en.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, `false`.| |**DisplayExpression**|Empty string ("")| |**Locale**|Same as the parent <xref:System.Data.DataSet> object's <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> (returned by the <xref:System.Data.DataSet.Locale%2A> property); if no parent exists, the default is the current system <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.| |**MinimumCapacity**|50 rows.| You can change the value for any of these properties through a separate call to the property.
trans-unit.target: Ellers `false`. | | **DisplayExpression**| Tom streng ("") | | **Locale**| Samme som overordnet <xref:System.Data.DataSet>objektets <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>(returneres av egenskapen <xref:System.Data.DataSet.Locale%2A>); Hvis det finnes en overordnet, standard er det gjeldende systemet <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>. | | **MinimumCapacity**|&50; rader. | Du kan endre verdien for disse egenskapene via en egen kall til egenskapen.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.Data.DataSet.Locale%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> class with the specified table name.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> klassen med det angitte tabellnavnet.

trans-unit.source: The name to give the table.
trans-unit.target: Navnet som skal gi tabellen.

trans-unit.source: If `tableName` is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or an empty string, a default name is given when added to the <xref href="System.Data.DataTableCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `tableName` er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> eller en tom streng standardnavnet er angitt når legges til i <xref href="System.Data.DataTableCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> class with the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> klasse med den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> og <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> constructor is required for <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>.
trans-unit.target: Denne implementeringen av <xref:System.Data.DataTable>konstruktøren kreves for <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: The data needed to serialize or deserialize an object.
trans-unit.target: Data som kreves for å serialisere eller deserialisering av et objekt.

trans-unit.source: The source and destination of a given serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: Kilde og mål for en gitt serialisert dataflyt.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> class using the specified table name and namespace.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av den angitte tabellnavn og navneområde.

trans-unit.source: The name to give the table.
trans-unit.target: Navnet som skal gi tabellen.

trans-unit.source: If `tableName` is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or an empty string, a default name is given when added to the <xref href="System.Data.DataTableCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `tableName` er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> eller en tom streng standardnavnet er angitt når legges til i <xref href="System.Data.DataTableCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The namespace for the XML representation of the data stored in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataTable" name="DataTable" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Navneområdet for XML-representasjon av data som er lagret i den <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataTable" name="DataTable" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Commits all the changes made to this table since the last time AcceptChanges was called.
trans-unit.target: Skriver alle endringene i denne tabellen siden forrige gang AcceptChanges ble kalt.

trans-unit.source: When AcceptChanges is called, any <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object still in edit mode successfully ends its edits.
trans-unit.target: Når AcceptChanges kalles, noen <xref:System.Data.DataRow>objektet fremdeles i redigeringsmodus slutter ble redigeringene.</xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataRowState> also changes: all `Added` and `Modified` rows become `Unchanged`, and `Deleted` rows are removed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.DataRowState>endres også: alle `Added` og `Modified` radene blir `Unchanged`, og `Deleted` rader er fjernet.</xref:System.Data.DataRowState>

trans-unit.source: The AcceptChanges method is generally called on a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> after you attempt to update the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> using the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden AcceptChanges kalles vanligvis på en <xref:System.Data.DataTable>Når du prøver å oppdatere den <xref:System.Data.DataSet>ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: Begins the initialization of a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: Starter initialisering av en <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> som er brukt i et skjema eller brukes av en annen komponent.

trans-unit.source: The initialization occurs at run time.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseringen oppstår under kjøring.

trans-unit.source: The Visual Studio .NET design environment uses this method to start the initialization of a component that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: Utformingsmiljøet i Visual Studio .NET bruker denne metoden til å starte initialisering av en komponent som er brukt i et skjema eller brukes av en annen komponent.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndInit%2A> method ends the initialization.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndInit%2A>metoden slutter initialiseringen.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the BeginInit and <xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndInit%2A> methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av BeginInit og <xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndInit%2A>metoder hindrer at kontrollen brukes før den er fullstendig initialisert.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Turns off notifications, index maintenance, and constraints while loading data.
trans-unit.target: Deaktiverer varslinger, indeksen Vedlikehold og begrensningene under innlasting av data.

trans-unit.source: Use BeginLoadData in conjunction with <xref:System.Data.DataTable.LoadDataRow%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndLoadData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk BeginLoadData sammen med <xref:System.Data.DataTable.LoadDataRow%2A>og <xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndLoadData%2A>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndLoadData%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.LoadDataRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether string comparisons within the table are case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: Angir om det skilles strengsammenligninger i tabellen.

trans-unit.source: The CaseSensitive property affects string comparisons in sorting, searching, and filtering.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen små/store bokstaver påvirker strengsammenligninger i sortering, søking og filtrering.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the comparison is case-sensitive; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis sammenligningen er resultater. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is set to the parent <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> object's <xref:System.Data.DataSet.CaseSensitive*> property, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> was created independently of a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard er satt til overordnet <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref> objektets <xref:System.Data.DataSet.CaseSensitive*>egenskapen eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> hvis den <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> ble opprettet uavhengig av en <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet.CaseSensitive*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child relations for this <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter samlingen av underordnede relasjoner for dette <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> defines the relationship between two tables.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Data.DataRelation>definerer relasjonen mellom to tabeller.</xref:System.Data.DataRelation>

trans-unit.source: Typically, two tables are linked through a single field that contains the same data.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis er to tabellene koblet til et enkelt felt som inneholder de samme dataene.

trans-unit.source: For example, a table which contains address data may have a single field containing codes that represent countries/regions.
trans-unit.target: En tabell som inneholder data for postadressen kan for eksempel ha ett enkelt felt som inneholder koder som representerer land.

trans-unit.source: A second table that contains country/region data will have a single field that contains the code that identifies the country/region, and it is this code which is inserted into the corresponding field in the first table.
trans-unit.target: En annen tabell som inneholder data som land/region har ett felt som inneholder koden som identifiserer land/område, og den er denne koden som settes inn i det tilsvarende feltet i den første tabellen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.DataRelation>, then, contains at least four pieces of information: (1) the name of the first table, (2) the column name in the first table, (3) the name of the second table, and (4) the column name in the second table.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Data.DataRelation>, står minst fire informasjonselementer: (1) navnet på den første tabellen, (2) kolonnenavn i den første tabellen, (3) navnet på den andre tabellen og (4) kolonnenavnet i den andre tabellen.</xref:System.Data.DataRelation>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DataRelationCollection"></xref> that contains the child relations for the table.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.DataRelationCollection"> </xref> som inneholder underordnede relasjoner for tabellen.

trans-unit.source: An empty collection is returned if no <xref href="System.Data.DataRelation"></xref> objects exist.
trans-unit.target: En tom samling returneres hvis ingen <xref href="System.Data.DataRelation"> </xref> objektene finnes.

trans-unit.source: Clears the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> of all data.
trans-unit.target: Tømmer den <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> alle data.

trans-unit.source: All rows in all tables are removed.
trans-unit.target: Alle rader i alle tabeller er fjernet.

trans-unit.source: An exception is generated if the table has any enforced child relations that would cause child rows to be orphaned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis tabellen inneholder noen tvungne underordnede relasjoner som vil føre til at underordnede rader som skal være løsreven, genereres det et unntak.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> is bound to an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDataDocument>, calling <xref:System.Data.DataSet.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or Clear raises the <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Data.DataSet>er bundet til en <xref:System.Xml.XmlDataDocument>kaller <xref:System.Data.DataSet.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eller fjern opphøyer <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.Data.DataSet.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDataDocument> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: To avoid this situation, traverse each table, removing each row one at a time.
trans-unit.target: Du kan unngå denne situasjonen ved går over hver tabell, fjerner hver rad én om gangen.

trans-unit.source: When you use <xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A> to create new rows, the rows must be processed before you call Clear.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker <xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A>for å opprette nye rader, radene, må behandles før du kaller Fjern.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: Clones the structure of the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>, including all <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> schemas and constraints.
trans-unit.target: Kloner strukturen i den <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>, inkludert alle <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> skjemaer og -begrensninger.

trans-unit.source: If these classes have been derived, the clone will also be of the same derived classes.
trans-unit.target: Hvis disse klassene er avledet, blir også klone i de samme avledede klassene.

trans-unit.source: Clone creates a new <xref:System.Data.DataTable> with the same structure as the original <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, but does not copy any data (the new <xref:System.Data.DataTable> will not contain any `DataRows`).
trans-unit.target: Klone oppretter en ny <xref:System.Data.DataTable>med samme struktur som opprinnelig <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, men ikke kopiere data (den nye <xref:System.Data.DataTable>inneholder ingen `DataRows`).</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: To copy both the structure and data into a new <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, use <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Copy%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Kopiere strukturen og data til en ny <xref:System.Data.DataTable>ved å bruke <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Copy%2A>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.Copy%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> with the same schema as the current <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En ny <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> med samme XML-skjemaet som gjeldende <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a value has been changed for the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> in a <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en verdi er endret for den angitte <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref> i en <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling DataTable Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [behandler DataTable hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a value is being changed for the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> in a <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en verdi endres for den angitte <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref> i en <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling DataTable Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [behandler DataTable hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of columns that belong to this table.
trans-unit.target: Henter samlingen av kolonner som tilhører denne tabellen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection> determines the schema of a table by defining the data type of each column.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection>bestemmer skjemaet for en tabell ved å definere datatypen for hver kolonne.</xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DataColumnCollection"></xref> that contains the collection of <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> objects for the table.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.DataColumnCollection"> </xref> som inneholder samlingen av <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref> objekter for tabellen.

trans-unit.source: An empty collection is returned if no <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> objects exist.
trans-unit.target: En tom samling returneres hvis ingen <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref> objektene finnes.

trans-unit.source: Computes the given expression on the current rows that pass the filter criteria.
trans-unit.target: Beregner det angitte uttrykket for de gjeldende radene som sendes av filtervilkår.

trans-unit.source: The `expression` parameter requires an aggregate function.
trans-unit.target: Den `expression` parameteren krever en aggregatfunksjon.

trans-unit.source: For example, the following is a legal expression: `Count(Quantity)` But this expression is not: `Sum (Quantity * UnitPrice)` If you must perform an operation on two or more columns, you should create a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>, set its <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A> property to an appropriate expression, and use an aggregate expression on the resulting column.
trans-unit.target: Følgende er et gyldig uttrykk for eksempel: `Count(Quantity)` , men dette uttrykket er ikke: `Sum (Quantity * UnitPrice)` Hvis du må utføre en operasjon på to eller flere kolonner, må du opprette en <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>, settes den <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A>egenskapen til en passende uttrykk og bruke et aggregatuttrykk på den resulterende kolonnen.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn>

trans-unit.source: In that case, given a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> with the name "total", and the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A> property set to this: `"Quantity * UnitPrice"` The expression argument for the Compute method would then be this: `Sum(total)` The second parameter, `filter`, determines which rows are used in the expression.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet gitt en <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>med navnet "Sum", og <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A>egenskapen satt til dette: `"Quantity * UnitPrice"` expression-argumentet for metoden Compute vil være dette: `Sum(total)` den andre parameteren `filter`, bestemmer hvilke rader som skal brukes i uttrykket.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the table contains a date column named "colDate", you could limit the rows with the following expression: `colDate > 1/1/99 AND colDate < 17/1/99` For rules on creating expressions for both parameters, see the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis tabellen inneholder en datokolonne med navnet "colDate", kan du for eksempel begrense radene med dette uttrykket: `colDate > 1/1/99 AND colDate < 17/1/99` regler for å opprette uttrykk for begge parameterne, kan du se den <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The expression to compute.
trans-unit.target: Uttrykket som brukes til å beregne.

trans-unit.source: The filter to limit the rows that evaluate in the expression.
trans-unit.target: Filter for å begrense radene som evaluerer i uttrykket.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object>, set to the result of the computation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>, angitt som et resultat av også verdier.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If the expression evaluates to null, the return value will be <xref href="System.DBNull.Value"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis uttrykket evalueres til null, blir returverdien <xref href="System.DBNull.Value"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of constraints maintained by this table.
trans-unit.target: Henter samlingen av begrensninger vedlikeholdes av denne tabellen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> restricts the action performed when a value in a column (or columns) is either deleted or updated.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>begrenser handlingen utføres når en verdi i en kolonne (eller kolonner) er slettet, eller oppdateres.</xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>

trans-unit.source: Such a constraint is intended to be used with primary key columns.
trans-unit.target: Denne betingelsen skal brukes med primærnøkkelkolonnene.

trans-unit.source: In a parent/child relationship between two tables, deleting a value from the parent table can affect the child rows in one of the following ways.
trans-unit.target: I en overordnet/underordnet-relasjon mellom to tabeller påvirke Hvis du sletter en verdi fra den overordnede tabellen underordnede rader i ett av følgende måter.

trans-unit.source: - The child rows can also be deleted (a cascading action).
trans-unit.target: -Underordnede rader kan også være slettet (gjennomgripende handling).

trans-unit.source: - The values in the child column (or columns) can be set to null values.
trans-unit.target: -Verdiene i de underordnede kolonnen (eller kolonnene) kan settes til null-verdier.

trans-unit.source: - The values in the child column (or columns) can be set to default values.
trans-unit.target: -Verdiene i de underordnede kolonnen (eller kolonnene) kan angis til standardverdiene.

trans-unit.source: - An exception can be generated.
trans-unit.target: -Kan generere et unntak.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> becomes active when attempting to set a value in a primary key to a non-unique value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>blir aktiv under forsøk på å angi en verdi i en primærnøkkel til en ikke-unik verdi.</xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.ConstraintCollection"></xref> that contains the collection of <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> objects for the table.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.ConstraintCollection"> </xref> som inneholder samlingen av <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> objekter for tabellen.

trans-unit.source: An empty collection is returned if no <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> objects exist.
trans-unit.target: En tom samling returneres hvis ingen <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> objektene finnes.

trans-unit.source: Copies both the structure and data for this <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Overfører strukturen og dataene for denne <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> with the same structure (table schemas and constraints) and data as this <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En ny <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> med samme (tabellskjemaer og begrensninger) og data som dette <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If these classes have been derived, the copy will also be of the same derived classes.
trans-unit.target: Hvis disse klassene er avledet, blir også kopien av samme avledede klasser.

trans-unit.source: Copy creates a new <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> with the same structure and data as the original <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kopier oppretter en ny <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> med samme struktur og data som opprinnelig <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To copy the structure to a new <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>, but not the data, use <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Clone*>.
trans-unit.target: Kopiere strukturen til en ny <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>, men ikke data, bruker <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Clone*>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.Clone*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Data.DataTableReader"></xref> corresponding to the data within this <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref href="System.Data.DataTableReader"> </xref> samsvarer med dataene i dette <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DataTableReader"></xref> containing one result set, corresponding to the source <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.DataTableReader"> </xref> som inneholder ett resultatsett, tilsvarer kilden <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The new expression.
trans-unit.target: Det nye uttrykket.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> to which this table belongs.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref> som denne tabellen tilhører.

trans-unit.source: If a control is data bound to a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, and the table belongs to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, you can get to the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> through this property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en kontroll data bundet til en <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, og tabellen tilhører en <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, får du tilgang til den <xref:System.Data.DataSet>gjennom denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> to which this table belongs.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref> som denne tabellen tilhører.

trans-unit.source: Gets a customized view of the table that may include a filtered view, or a cursor position.
trans-unit.target: Henter en tilpasset visning av tabellen som kan inneholde en filtervisning eller en markørposisjon.

trans-unit.source: The DefaultView property returns a <xref:System.Data.DataView> you can use to sort, filter, and search a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DefaultView returnerer en <xref:System.Data.DataView>du kan bruke til å sortere, filtrere, og søk <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.DataView"> </xref> knyttet til den <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the expression that returns a value used to represent this table in the user interface.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir uttrykk som returnerer en verdi som brukes til å representere denne tabellen i brukergrensesnittet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_DisplayExpression" name="DisplayExpression" href=""></xref> property lets you display the name of this table in a user interface.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_DisplayExpression" name="DisplayExpression" href=""> </xref> egenskapen lar deg vise navnet på tabellen i et brukergrensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: A display string.
trans-unit.target: Visningsstreng.

trans-unit.source: Ends the initialization of a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: Slutter initialisering av en <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> som er brukt i et skjema eller brukes av en annen komponent.

trans-unit.source: The initialization occurs at run time.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseringen oppstår under kjøring.

trans-unit.source: The Visual Studio .NET design environment uses this method to end the initialization of a component that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: Utformingsmiljøet i Visual Studio .NET bruker denne metoden avsluttes initialisering av en komponent som er brukt i et skjema eller brukes av en annen komponent.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginInit%2A> method starts the initialization.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginInit%2A>metoden starter initialiseringen.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginInit%2A> and EndInit methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginInit%2A>og EndInit metoder hindrer at kontrollen brukes før den er fullstendig initialisert.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Turns on notifications, index maintenance, and constraints after loading data.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer varsler, indeksen Vedlikehold og begrensninger etter innlasting av data.

trans-unit.source: Use EndLoadData in conjunction with <xref:System.Data.DataTable.LoadDataRow%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginLoadData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk EndLoadData sammen med <xref:System.Data.DataTable.LoadDataRow%2A>og <xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginLoadData%2A>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginLoadData%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.LoadDataRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of customized user information.
trans-unit.target: Henter samlingen av egendefinerte brukerinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: Use the ExtendedProperties to add custom information to a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ExtendedProperties til for <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: Add information with the `Add` method.
trans-unit.target: Legg til informasjonen med den `Add` metoden.

trans-unit.source: Retrieve information with the `Item` method.
trans-unit.target: Henter informasjon med den `Item` metoden.

trans-unit.source: Extended properties must be of type <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Utvidede egenskaper må være av typen <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Properties that are not of type String are not persisted when the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is written as XML.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper som ikke er av typen streng er ikke faste når den <xref:System.Data.DataTable>skrives som XML.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.PropertyCollection"></xref> that contains custom user information.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.PropertyCollection"> </xref> som inneholder egendefinert brukerinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: Checks whether initialization is in progress.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer om initialisering pågår.

trans-unit.source: The initialization occurs at run time.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseringen oppstår under kjøring.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a copy of the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> that contains all changes made to it since it was loaded or <xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges*> was last called.
trans-unit.target: Henter en kopi av det <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> som inneholder alle endringer til den siden det ble lastet inn eller <xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges*>sist ble kalt.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges*>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref:System.Data.DataSet> containing a copy of all rows in the original <xref:System.Data.DataSet> that have pending changes.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny <xref:System.Data.DataSet>som inneholder en kopi av alle rader i opprinnelige <xref:System.Data.DataSet>som har ventende endringer.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: Relationship constraints can cause additional unchanged rows to be added to the new <xref:System.Data.DataSet> if the unchanged rows contain primary keys corresponding to foreign keys in the changed rows.
trans-unit.target: Relasjonen begrensninger kan føre til at flere uendret rader som skal legges til den nye <xref:System.Data.DataSet>Hvis uendret radene inneholde primærnøkler tilsvarer sekundærnøkler i endrede rader.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: The method returns `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if there are no rows in the original <xref:System.Data.DataSet> with pending changes.
trans-unit.target: Metoden returnerer `null` (`Nothing` i Visual Basic) Hvis det finnes ingen rader i opprinnelige <xref:System.Data.DataSet>med ventende endringer.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: A copy of the changes from this <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no changes are found.
trans-unit.target: En kopi av endringer fra dette <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis det finnes ingen endringer.

trans-unit.source: Gets a copy of the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> containing all changes made to it since it was last loaded, or since <xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges*> was called, filtered by <xref href="System.Data.DataRowState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en kopi av det <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> som inneholder alle endringer til den siden den sist ble lastet inn, eller siden <xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges*>ble kalt, filtrert etter <xref href="System.Data.DataRowState"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataTable.GetChanges%2A> method is used to produce a second <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object that contains only the changes introduced into the original.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.GetChanges%2A>metoden brukes til å generere en annen <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objekt som inneholder bare endringer som innføres i opprinnelige.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.GetChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the `rowStates` argument to specify the type of changes the new object should include.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av `rowStates` argumentet til å angi typen endringer som skal ta med det nye objektet.

trans-unit.source: Relationship constraints may cause unchanged parent rows to be included.
trans-unit.target: Begrensninger for relasjonen, kan det føre til at uendret overordnede rader som skal inkluderes.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.DataRowState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Data.DataRowState"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: A filtered copy of the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> that can have actions performed on it, and later be merged back in the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> using <xref:System.Data.DataSet.Merge*>.
trans-unit.target: En filtrert kopi av det <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> som kan ha handlingene som utføres i den og nyere flettes tilbake i den <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> i <xref:System.Data.DataSet.Merge*>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet.Merge*>

trans-unit.source: If no rows of the desired <xref href="System.Data.DataRowState"></xref> are found, the method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen rader i den ønskede <xref href="System.Data.DataRowState"> </xref> blir funnet, returneres <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method returns an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> instance containing the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) that describes the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> for Web Services.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer en <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref> forekomsten som inneholder den Web Services (WSDL = Description Language) som beskriver det <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> for Web Services.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> objects that contain errors.
trans-unit.target: Henter en matrise av <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> objekter som inneholder feil.

trans-unit.source: Returns the list of <xref:System.Data.DataRow> objects that have <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowError%2A> set.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den <xref:System.Data.DataRow>objekter som har <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowError%2A>angitt.</xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowError%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: For example, errors can occur when calling <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.Update%2A> with <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.ContinueUpdateOnError%2A> set to **true**.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel feil kan oppstå når du kaller <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.Update%2A>med <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.ContinueUpdateOnError%2A>satt til **true**.</xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.ContinueUpdateOnError%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: Do not invoke <xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A> on the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> until you resolve all errors and resubmit the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> for updating.
trans-unit.target: Ikke aktivere <xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A>på den <xref:System.Data.DataTable>før du løse alle feil, og Send det <xref:System.Data.DataSet>for oppdatering.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> objects that have errors.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> objekter med feil.

trans-unit.source: Populates a serialization information object with the data needed to serialize the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fyller ut et objekt for serialisering informasjon med dataene som kreves for å serialisere den <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that holds the serialized data associated with the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objekt som har de serialiserte dataene som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object that contains the source and destination of the serialized stream associated with the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>objekt som inneholder kilde og mål for serialisert dataflyt knyttet til den <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: The info parameter is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Den info parameteren er en nullreferanse ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets the row type.
trans-unit.target: Henter radtypen.

trans-unit.source: Returns the type of the <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer typen for den <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: En beskrivelse for dette medlemmet under <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> that describes the XML representation of the object that is produced by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml*> method and consumed by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml*> method.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>som beskriver XML-representasjon av objektet som er generert av den <> </> *> metoden og forbrukes av den <> </> *> metode.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether there are errors in any of the rows in any of the tables of the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> to which the table belongs.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om det er feil i noen av radene i noen av tabeller med den <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref> som tabellen tilhører.

trans-unit.source: As users work on a set of data contained in a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, you can mark each change with an error if the change causes some validation failure.
trans-unit.target: Når brukerne arbeider på et sett med data i en <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, kan du merke hver endring av en feil hvis endringen fører til at noen valideringsfeil.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: You can mark an entire <xref:System.Data.DataRow> with an error message using the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowError%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan merke hele <xref:System.Data.DataRow>med en feil meldingen ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowError%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowError%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: You can also set errors on each column of the row with the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.SetColumnError%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi feil på hver kolonne i raden med den <xref:System.Data.DataRow.SetColumnError%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Data.DataRow.SetColumnError%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before updating a data source with a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, it's recommended that you first invoke the <xref:System.Data.DataSet.GetChanges%2A> method on the target <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: Før du oppdaterer en datakilde med en <xref:System.Data.DataSet>anbefales det at du først aktivere <xref:System.Data.DataSet.GetChanges%2A>metoden for målet <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataSet.GetChanges%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: The method results in a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> that contains only the changes made to the original.
trans-unit.target: Metoden resulterer i en <xref:System.Data.DataSet>som inneholder bare endringer i opprinnelige.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: Before sending the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> to the data source for updating, check the HasErrors property of each table to see if any errors have been attached to the rows or columns in the rows.
trans-unit.target: Før du sender den <xref:System.Data.DataSet>til datakilden for oppdatering, kan du se egenskapen HasErrors for hver tabell for å se om eventuelle feil som er knyttet til rader eller kolonner i radene.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: After reconciling each error, clear the errors with the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.ClearErrors%2A> method of the `DataRow`.
trans-unit.target: Etter avstemmer hver feil, fjerner du feil med den <xref:System.Data.DataRow.ClearErrors%2A>metoden for den `DataRow`.</xref:System.Data.DataRow.ClearErrors%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if errors exist; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis feil; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies a <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> into a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>, preserving any property settings, as well as original and current values.
trans-unit.target: Kopier en <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> til en <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>, beholdes alle egenskapsinnstillingene, i tillegg til opprinnelige og gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A> adds a row to the table using the existing table schema, but with default values for the row, and sets the <xref:System.Data.DataRowState> to `Detached`.
trans-unit.target: Kaller <xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A>legger til en rad i tabellen ved hjelp av eksisterende tabellskjemaet, men med standardverdier for raden, og angir de <xref:System.Data.DataRowState>til `Detached`.</xref:System.Data.DataRowState> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.NewRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling ImportRow preserves the existing <xref:System.Data.DataRowState> along with other values in the row.
trans-unit.target: Kaller ImportRow beholder den eksisterende <xref:System.Data.DataRowState>sammen med andre verdier i raden.</xref:System.Data.DataRowState>

trans-unit.source: If the `DataRow` that is passed as a parameter is in a detached state, it is ignored, and no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `DataRow` som blir sendt som en parameter som er i frakoblet tilstand, ignoreres, og ingen unntak.

trans-unit.source: The new row will be added to the end of the data table.
trans-unit.target: Den nye raden legges til slutten av tabellen.

trans-unit.source: If the new row violates a Constraint it won’t be added to the data table.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ny rad overholder ikke en begrensning den ikke legges til tabellen.

trans-unit.source: You can get the index of the new row with as DataTable.Rows.Find and DataTable.Rows.IndexOf.
trans-unit.target: Du kan få ny rad med DataTable.Rows.Find og DataTable.Rows.IndexOf indeksen.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Rows%2A> for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection>og <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Rows%2A>for mer informasjon.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to be imported.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> som skal importeres.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> is initialized.
trans-unit.target: Inntreffer etter den <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> er initialisert.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.DataTable.IsInitialized%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Data.DataTable.IsInitialized%2A>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.IsInitialized%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> is initialized.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> er initialisert.

trans-unit.source: Returns the status of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> while it’s being constructed, for instance by Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer statusen for den <xref:System.Data.DataTable>mens den blir opprettet for forekomsten av Visual Studio.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginInit%2A> method sets it to `false` and <xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndInit%2A> method sets it to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginInit%2A>metoden settes til `false` og <xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndInit%2A>metoden settes til `true`.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the component has completed initialization; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>for å angi komponenten er fullført initialisering; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Fills a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> with values from a data source using the supplied <xref href="System.Data.IDataReader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fyller en <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> med verdier fra en datakilde ved hjelp av den angitte <xref href="System.Data.IDataReader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> already contains rows, the incoming data from the data source is merged with the existing rows.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> inneholder allerede rader, innkommende data fra datakilden slås sammen med de eksisterende radene.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.IDataReader"></xref> that provides a result set.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.IDataReader"> </xref> som gir et resultatsett.

trans-unit.source: Fills a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> with values from a data source using the supplied <xref href="System.Data.IDataReader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fyller en <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> med verdier fra en datakilde ved hjelp av den angitte <xref href="System.Data.IDataReader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the already contains rows, the incoming data from the data source is merged with the existing rows according to the value of the loadOption parameter.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den inneholder allerede rader, innkommende data fra datakilden slås sammen med de eksisterende radene i henhold til verdien for den loadOption parameteren.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.IDataReader"></xref> that provides one or more result sets.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.IDataReader"> </xref> som inneholder én eller flere resultatsett.

trans-unit.source: A value from the <xref href="System.Data.LoadOption"></xref> enumeration that indicates how rows already in the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> are combined with incoming rows that share the same primary key.
trans-unit.target: En verdi fra den <xref href="System.Data.LoadOption"> </xref> opplisting som angir hvordan rader i den <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> kombineres med innkommende rader som deler samme primærnøkkel.

trans-unit.source: Fills a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> with values from a data source using the supplied <xref href="System.Data.IDataReader"></xref> using an error-handling delegate.
trans-unit.target: Fyller en <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> med verdier fra en datakilde ved hjelp av den angitte <xref href="System.Data.IDataReader"> </xref> ved hjelp av en feilbehandling representant.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.IDataReader"></xref> that provides a result set.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.IDataReader"> </xref> som gir et resultatsett.

trans-unit.source: A value from the <xref href="System.Data.LoadOption"></xref> enumeration that indicates how rows already in the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> are combined with incoming rows that share the same primary key.
trans-unit.target: En verdi fra den <xref href="System.Data.LoadOption"> </xref> opplisting som angir hvordan rader i den <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> kombineres med innkommende rader som deler samme primærnøkkel.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.FillErrorEventHandler"></xref> delegate to call when an error occurs while loading data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.FillErrorEventHandler"> </xref> representant å kalle når det oppstår en feil under innlasting av data.

trans-unit.source: Finds and updates a specific row.
trans-unit.target: Søker etter og oppdaterer en bestemt rad.

trans-unit.source: If no matching row is found, a new row is created using the given values.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes ingen samsvarende rad, opprettes en ny rad med de angitte verdiene.

trans-unit.source: The LoadDataRow method takes an array of values and finds the matching value(s) in the primary key column(s).
trans-unit.target: Metoden LoadDataRow tar en matrise med verdier, og søker etter de samsvarende verdiene i primary key kolonne(r).

trans-unit.source: If a column has a default value, pass a null value in the array to set the default value for that column.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en kolonne har en standardverdi, kan du sende en null-verdi i matrisen til å angi verdien for kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if a column has its <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A> property set to true, pass a null value in the array to set the automatically generated value for the row.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte hvis en kolonne har den <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>-egenskapen satt til true, sendes en null-verdi i matrisen slik at de automatisk genererte verdien for raden.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the `fAcceptChanges` parameter is `true` or not specified, the new data is added and then <xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A> is called to accept all changes in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>; if the argument is `false`, newly added rows are marked as insertions, and changes to existing rows are marked as modifications.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `fAcceptChanges` parameteren er `true` eller ikke er angitt, legges det nye data og deretter <xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A>kalles for å godta alle endringer i den <xref:System.Data.DataTable>; Hvis argumentet er `false`nye rader er merket som innsettinger og endringer i eksisterende rader er merket som endringer.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: Exceptions can also occur during either a <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging> event.
trans-unit.target: Unntak kan også oppstå enten en <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging>eller <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging>hendelsen.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging>

trans-unit.source: If an exception occurs, the row is not added to the table.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det oppstår et unntak, legges ikke raden i tabellen.

trans-unit.source: Use LoadDataRow in conjunction with <xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginLoadData%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndLoadData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk LoadDataRow sammen med <xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginLoadData%2A>og <xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndLoadData%2A>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndLoadData%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginLoadData%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of values used to create the new row.
trans-unit.target: En matrise med verdier som brukes til å opprette ny rad.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to accept changes; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Godta endringer. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The new <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The array is larger than the number of columns in the table.
trans-unit.target: Matrisen er større enn antallet kolonner i tabellen.

trans-unit.source: A value doesn't match its respective column type.
trans-unit.target: En verdi samsvarer ikke med den tilsvarende kolonnetypen.

trans-unit.source: Adding the row invalidates a constraint.
trans-unit.target: Legge til raden ugyldiggjøres en begrensning.

trans-unit.source: Attempting to put a null in a column where <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull*> is false.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å sette en null-verdi i en kolonne der <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull*>er USANN.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull*>

trans-unit.source: Finds and updates a specific row.
trans-unit.target: Søker etter og oppdaterer en bestemt rad.

trans-unit.source: If no matching row is found, a new row is created using the given values.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes ingen samsvarende rad, opprettes en ny rad med de angitte verdiene.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataTable.LoadDataRow%2A> method takes an array of values and finds the matching value(s) in the primary key column(s).
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.LoadDataRow%2A>metoden tar en matrise med verdier, og søker etter de samsvarende verdiene i den primære nøkkelen kolonne(r).</xref:System.Data.DataTable.LoadDataRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a column has a default value, pass a null value in the array to set the default value for that column.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en kolonne har en standardverdi, kan du sende en null-verdi i matrisen til å angi verdien for kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if a column has its <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A> property set to true, pass a null value in the array to set the automatically generated value for the row.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte hvis en kolonne har den <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>-egenskapen satt til true, sendes en null-verdi i matrisen slik at de automatisk genererte verdien for raden.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the `loadOption` parameter is used to determine how the values in the array are applied to an existing row.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den `loadOption` parameteren brukes til å finne ut hvordan verdiene i matrisen brukes på en eksisterende rad.

trans-unit.source: For example, if `loadOption` is set to `OverwriteChanges`, the `Original` and `Current` values of each column are replaced with the values in the incoming row and the `RowState` property is set to `Unchanged`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis `loadOption` er satt til `OverwriteChanges`, `Original` og `Current` verdier for hver kolonne blir erstattet med verdiene i den innkommende raden og `RowState` er satt til `Unchanged`.

trans-unit.source: Exceptions can also occur during either a <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging> event.
trans-unit.target: Unntak kan også oppstå enten en <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging>eller <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging>hendelsen.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging>

trans-unit.source: If an exception occurs, the row is not added to the table.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det oppstår et unntak, legges ikke raden i tabellen.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Data.DataTable.LoadDataRow%2A> in conjunction with <xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginLoadData%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndLoadData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk <xref:System.Data.DataTable.LoadDataRow%2A>sammen med <xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginLoadData%2A>og <xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndLoadData%2A>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndLoadData%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginLoadData%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.LoadDataRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of values used to create the new row.
trans-unit.target: En matrise med verdier som brukes til å opprette ny rad.

trans-unit.source: Used to determine how the array values are applied to the corresponding values in an existing row.
trans-unit.target: Brukes til å bestemme hvordan Matriseverdiene brukes de tilhørende verdiene i en eksisterende rad.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The new <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the locale information used to compare strings within the table.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir nasjonal innstilling informasjonen som ble brukt til å sammenligne strenger i tabellen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> represents the software preferences of a particular culture or community.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>representerer innstillingene for programvare for en bestemt kultur eller fellesskapet.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: When used for string comparisons, the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> affects sorting, comparisons, and filtering.
trans-unit.target: Når det brukes for strengsammenligninger av <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>påvirker, sammenligninger, og sortering.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In columns that contain expressions, the <xref:System.StringComparison> is used.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I kolonnene som inneholder uttrykk, den <xref:System.StringComparison>brukes.</xref:System.StringComparison>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.StringComparison> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.StringComparison>ignoreres.</xref:System.StringComparison>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that contains data about the user's machine locale.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>som inneholder data om brukerens maskinen nasjonal innstilling.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The default is the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> object's <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> (returned by the <xref:System.Data.DataSet.Locale*> property) to which the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> belongs; if the table doesn't belong to a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>, the default is the current system <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Standard er det <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref> objektets <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>(returnert av den <xref:System.Data.DataSet.Locale*>egenskapen) som den <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> tilhører; Hvis tabellen ikke tilhører en <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>, standard er det gjeldende systemet <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.Data.DataSet.Locale*> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Merge the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> with the current <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Slå sammen den angitte <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> med gjeldende <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Merge method is used to merge two <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects that have largely similar schemas.
trans-unit.target: Merge-metoden brukes til å slå sammen to <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objekter med stor grad lignende skjemaer.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: A merge is typically used on a client application to incorporate the latest changes from a data source into an existing <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: Et merge brukes vanligvis på et klientprogram for å ta de nyeste endringene fra en datakilde i en eksisterende <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: This allows the client application to have a refreshed <xref:System.Data.DataTable> with the latest data from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det mulig for klientprogrammet skal ha et oppdateres <xref:System.Data.DataTable>med de nyeste dataene fra datakilden.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: The merge operation takes into account only the original table, and the table to be merged.
trans-unit.target: Fletteoperasjonen tar hensyn til den opprinnelige tabellen, og tabellen som skal flettes.

trans-unit.source: Child tables are not affected or included.
trans-unit.target: Underordnede tabeller er ikke berørt eller inkludert.

trans-unit.source: If a table has one or more child tables, defined as part of a relationship, each child table must be merged individually.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en tabell som har én eller flere underordnede tabeller, definert som en del av en-relasjon, må hver tabell som underordnet flettes enkeltvis.

trans-unit.source: The `Merge` method is typically called at the end of a series of procedures that involve validating changes, reconciling errors, updating the data source with the changes, and finally refreshing the existing <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: Den `Merge` vanligvis-metoden på slutten av en rekke prosedyrer som involverer validering endringer avstemmer feil, oppdaterer datakilden med endringene og til slutt oppdatere den eksisterende <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: When performing a merge, changes made to the existing data before the merge are preserved by default during the merge operation.
trans-unit.target: Når du utfører en fletting, beholdes endringer i de eksisterende dataene før flettingen som standard under flettingen.

trans-unit.source: Developers can modify this behavior by calling one of the other two overloads for this method, and specifying a false value for the `preserveChanges` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Utviklere kan endre dette problemet ved å kalle en av de to overlastingene for denne metoden, og angir verdien USANN for den `preserveChanges` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: In a client application, it is usual to have a single button that the user can click that gathers the changed data and validates it before sending it back to a middle tier component.
trans-unit.target: I et klientprogram er det vanlige skal ha én enkelt knapp som brukeren kan klikke som samler endrede data og validerer før du sender den til en midterste skalaenhet komponent.

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.GetChanges%2A> method is first invoked.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.GetChanges%2A>metoden aktiveres først.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.GetChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: That method returns a second <xref:System.Data.DataTable> optimized for validating and merging.
trans-unit.target: Metoden returnerer sekund <xref:System.Data.DataTable>optimalisert for å validere og sammenslåing.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: This second <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object contains only the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> objects that were changed, resulting in a subset of the original <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: Denne andre <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objektet inneholder bare <xref:System.Data.DataRow>objekter som ble endret, noe som førte til et delsett av opprinnelige <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: This subset is generally smaller and thus more efficiently passed back to a middle tier component.
trans-unit.target: Denne delsett er vanligvis mindre og dermed mer effektivt sendt tilbake til en midterste skalaenhet komponent.

trans-unit.source: The middle tier component then updates the original data source with the changes through stored procedures.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten midterste skalaenhet oppdaterer deretter den opprinnelige datakilden med endringene via lagrede prosedyrer.

trans-unit.source: The middle tier can then send back either a new <xref:System.Data.DataTable> that includes original data and the latest data from the data source (by running the original query again), or it can send back the subset with any changes that have been made to it from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Midterste skalaenhet kan deretter sende tilbake en ny <xref:System.Data.DataTable>som inkluderer opprinnelige dataene og de nyeste dataene fra datakilden (ved å kjøre den opprinnelige spørringen på nytt), eller den kan sende delsettet med endringer som er gjort i den fra datakilden.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: (For example, if the data source automatically creates unique primary key values, these values can be propagated back to the client application.) In either case, the returned <xref:System.Data.DataTable> can be merged back into the client application's original <xref:System.Data.DataTable> with the Merge method.
trans-unit.target: (For eksempel hvis datakilden opprettes automatisk unike primære nøkkelverdier, disse verdiene kan overføres til klientprogrammet.) Uansett det returnerte <xref:System.Data.DataTable>kan slås sammen tilbake til det klientprogrammet opprinnelig <xref:System.Data.DataTable>med metoden Merge.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: When merging a new source <xref:System.Data.DataTable> into the target, any source rows with a <xref:System.Data.DataRowState> value of `Unchanged`, `Modified`, or `Deleted`, is matched to target rows with the same primary key values.
trans-unit.target: Når du slår sammen en ny kilde <xref:System.Data.DataTable>til målet, noen kilde rader med et <xref:System.Data.DataRowState>verdien for `Unchanged`, `Modified`, eller `Deleted`, er tilordnet mål rader med samme primære nøkkelverdier.</xref:System.Data.DataRowState> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: Source rows with a <xref:System.Data.DataRowState> value of `Added` are matched to new target rows with the same primary key values as the new source rows.
trans-unit.target: Kilde rader med et <xref:System.Data.DataRowState>verdien `Added` passer til nye mål rader med samme primære nøkkelverdier som de nye kilderadene.</xref:System.Data.DataRowState>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> to be merged with the current <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
