trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> skal slås sammen med gjeldende <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Merge the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> with the current <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataTable" name="DataTable" href=""></xref>, indicating whether to preserve changes in the current <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataTable" name="DataTable" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Slå sammen den angitte <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> med gjeldende <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataTable" name="DataTable" href=""> </xref>, som angir om du vil beholde endringene i gjeldende <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataTable" name="DataTable" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Merge method is used to merge two <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects that have largely similar schemas.
trans-unit.target: Merge-metoden brukes til å slå sammen to <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objekter med stor grad lignende skjemaer.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: A merge is typically used on a client application to incorporate the latest changes from a data source into an existing <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: Et merge brukes vanligvis på et klientprogram for å ta de nyeste endringene fra en datakilde i en eksisterende <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: This allows the client application to have a refreshed <xref:System.Data.DataTable> with the latest data from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det mulig for klientprogrammet skal ha et oppdateres <xref:System.Data.DataTable>med de nyeste dataene fra datakilden.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: The merge operation takes into account only the original table, and the table to be merged.
trans-unit.target: Fletteoperasjonen tar hensyn til den opprinnelige tabellen, og tabellen som skal flettes.

trans-unit.source: Child tables are not affected or included.
trans-unit.target: Underordnede tabeller er ikke berørt eller inkludert.

trans-unit.source: If a table has one or more child tables, defined as part of a relationship, each child table must be merged individually.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en tabell som har én eller flere underordnede tabeller, definert som en del av en-relasjon, må hver tabell som underordnet flettes enkeltvis.

trans-unit.source: The `Merge` method is typically called at the end of a series of procedures that involve validating changes, reconciling errors, updating the data source with the changes, and finally refreshing the existing <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: Den `Merge` vanligvis-metoden på slutten av en rekke prosedyrer som involverer validering endringer avstemmer feil, oppdaterer datakilden med endringene og til slutt oppdatere den eksisterende <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: When performing a merge, changes made to the existing data before the merge are preserved during the merge operation unless the developer specifies false for the `preserveChanges` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Når du utfører en fletting, beholdes endringer i de eksisterende dataene før flettingen under flettingen hvis utvikleren angir false for den `preserveChanges` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: If the `preserveChanges` parameter is set to `true`, incoming values do not overwrite existing values in the Current row version of the existing row.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `preserveChanges` parameteren er satt til `true`, innkommende verdier ikke Overskriv eksisterende verdiene i den gjeldende rad-versjonen av den eksisterende raden.

trans-unit.source: If the `preserveChanges` parameter is set to `false`, incoming values do overwrite the existing values in the Current row version of the existing row.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `preserveChanges` parameteren er satt til `false`, innkommende verdier må overskrive de eksisterende verdiene i den gjeldende rad-versjonen av den eksisterende raden.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row versions, see [Row States and Row Versions](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om rad versjoner [rad tilstander og rad versjoner](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: In a client application, it is usual to have a single button that the user can click that gathers the changed data and validates it before sending it back to a middle tier component.
trans-unit.target: I et klientprogram er det vanlige skal ha én enkelt knapp som brukeren kan klikke som samler endrede data og validerer før du sender den til en midterste skalaenhet komponent.

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.GetChanges%2A> method is first invoked.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.GetChanges%2A>metoden aktiveres først.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.GetChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: That method returns a second <xref:System.Data.DataTable> optimized for validating and merging.
trans-unit.target: Metoden returnerer sekund <xref:System.Data.DataTable>optimalisert for å validere og sammenslåing.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: This second <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object contains only the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> and <xref:System.Data.DataRow> objects that were changed, resulting in a subset of the original <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: Denne andre <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objektet inneholder bare <xref:System.Data.DataTable>og <xref:System.Data.DataRow>objekter som ble endret, noe som førte til et delsett av opprinnelige <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: This subset is generally smaller, and thus this subset is more efficiently passed back to a middle tier component.
trans-unit.target: Denne delsett er vanligvis mindre, og dermed dette delsettet mer effektivt er sendt til en midterste skalaenhet komponent.

trans-unit.source: The middle tier component then updates the original data source with the changes through stored procedures.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten midterste skalaenhet oppdaterer deretter den opprinnelige datakilden med endringene via lagrede prosedyrer.

trans-unit.source: The middle tier can then send back either a new <xref:System.Data.DataTable> that includes original data and the latest data from the data source (by running the original query again), or it can send back the subset with any changes that have been made to it from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Midterste skalaenhet kan deretter sende tilbake en ny <xref:System.Data.DataTable>som inkluderer opprinnelige dataene og de nyeste dataene fra datakilden (ved å kjøre den opprinnelige spørringen på nytt), eller den kan sende delsettet med endringer som er gjort i den fra datakilden.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: (For example, if the data source automatically creates unique primary key values, these values can be propagated back to the client application.) In either case, the returned <xref:System.Data.DataTable> can be merged back into the client application's original <xref:System.Data.DataTable> with the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Merge%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: (For eksempel hvis datakilden opprettes automatisk unike primære nøkkelverdier, disse verdiene kan overføres til klientprogrammet.) Uansett det returnerte <xref:System.Data.DataTable>kan slås sammen tilbake til det klientprogrammet opprinnelig <xref:System.Data.DataTable>med den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Merge%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.Merge%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: When merging a new source <xref:System.Data.DataTable> into the target, any source rows with a <xref:System.Data.DataRowState> value of `Unchanged`, `Modified`, or `Deleted` are matched to target rows with the same primary key values.
trans-unit.target: Når du slår sammen en ny kilde <xref:System.Data.DataTable>til målet, noen kilde rader med et <xref:System.Data.DataRowState>verdien `Unchanged`, `Modified`, eller `Deleted` target radene med de samme primære nøkkelverdiene samsvarer med.</xref:System.Data.DataRowState> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: Source rows with a <xref:System.Data.DataRowState> value of `Added` are matched to new target rows with the same primary key values as the new source rows.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Merge%2A> method is called, the schemas of the two <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects are compared, because it is possible that the schemas may have been changed.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Merge%2A>-metoden, skjemaene i to <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objekter sammenlignes, fordi det er mulig at skjemaene kan ha blitt endret.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.Merge%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, in a business-to-business scenario, new columns may have been added to an XML schema by an automated process.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel i en bedrift-til-bedrift-scenarioet kan nye kolonner er lagt til et XML-skjema med en automatisert prosess.

trans-unit.source: If the source <xref:System.Data.DataTable> contains schema elements (added <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> objects) that are missing in the target, the schema elements can be added to the target by setting the `missingSchemaAction` argument to `MissingSchemaAction.Add`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kilden <xref:System.Data.DataTable>inneholder skjemaelementer (lagt til <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>objekter) som mangler i målet, skjemaelementene kan legges til målet ved å angi den `missingSchemaAction` argumentet til `MissingSchemaAction.Add`.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the merged <xref:System.Data.DataTable> contains the added schema and data.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet, den sammenslåtte <xref:System.Data.DataTable>inneholder tillagt skjema og data.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: After merging schemas, the data is merged.
trans-unit.target: Etter sammenslåing skjemaer flettes dataene.

trans-unit.source: When merging a new source <xref:System.Data.DataTable> into the target, any source rows with a <xref:System.Data.DataRowState> value of `Unchanged`, `Modified`, or `Deleted` are matched to target rows with the same primary key values.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the initial starting size for this table.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir størrelsen på første Start for denne tabellen.

trans-unit.source: The MinimumCapacity allows the system to create an appropriate set of resources before fetching data.
trans-unit.target: MinimumCapacity lar systemet til å opprette et passende sett med ressurser før henting av data.

trans-unit.source: In a situation when performance is critical, setting this property can optimize performance.
trans-unit.target: En når ytelse er kritiske, kan angi denne egenskapen optimalisere ytelsen.

trans-unit.source: The initial starting size in rows of this table.
trans-unit.target: Den opprinnelige Start størrelsen på radene i tabellen.

trans-unit.source: The default is 50.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er 50.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the namespace for the XML representation of the data stored in the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navneområdet for XML-representasjon av data som er lagret i den <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Navneområdet for den <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> with the same schema as the table.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> med samme XML-skjemaet som tabellen.

trans-unit.source: You must use the NewRow method to create new <xref:System.Data.DataRow> objects with the same schema as the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: Du må bruke NewRow-metoden til å opprette nye <xref:System.Data.DataRow>objekter med samme XML-skjemaet som <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: After creating a <xref:System.Data.DataRow>, you can add it to the <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection>, through the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object's <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Rows%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når du har opprettet en <xref:System.Data.DataRow>, kan du legge den til den <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection>, til den <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objektets <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Rows%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection> </xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: When you use NewRow to create new rows, the rows must be added to or deleted from the data table before you call <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Clear%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker NewRow til å opprette nye rader, må radene legges til eller slettes fra tabellen før du kaller <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Clear%2A>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of parent relations for this <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter samlingen av overordnede relasjoner for dette <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.DataRelationCollection"> </xref> som inneholder de overordnede relasjonene for tabellen.

trans-unit.source: An empty collection is returned if no <xref href="System.Data.DataRelation"></xref> objects exist.
trans-unit.target: En tom samling returneres hvis ingen <xref href="System.Data.DataRelation"> </xref> objektene finnes.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the namespace for the XML representation of the data stored in the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navneområdet for XML-representasjon av data som er lagret i den <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The prefix of the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Prefikset for den <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array of columns that function as primary keys for the data table.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en matrise av kolonner som fungerer som primærnøkler for datatabellen.

trans-unit.source: The primary key of a table must be unique to identify the record in the table.
trans-unit.target: Primærnøkkelen i en tabell må være unike til å identifisere post i tabellen.

trans-unit.source: It's also possible to have a table with a primary key made up of two or more columns.
trans-unit.target: Det er også mulig å ha en tabell med en primærnøkkel som består av to eller flere kolonner.

trans-unit.source: This occurs when a single column can't contain enough unique values.
trans-unit.target: Dette skjer når en enkelt kolonne ikke kan inneholde nok unike verdier.

trans-unit.source: For example, a two column primary key might consist of a "FirstName" and "LastName" column.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel kan en primærnøkkel for to kolonner bestå av en "Fornavn" og "Etternavn"-kolonne.

trans-unit.source: Because primary keys can be made up of more than one column, the PrimaryKey property consists of an array of <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> objects.
trans-unit.target: Fordi primærnøkler kan bestå av mer enn én kolonne, egenskapen PrimaryKey består av en matrise av <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>objekter.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: The key is a foreign key.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen er en sekundærnøkkel.

trans-unit.source: Reads XML schema and data into the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> using the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Leser XML-skjema og data i den <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> ved hjelp av den angitte <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref:System.Data.DataTable> and its descendents are loaded with the data from the supplied <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Den gjeldende <xref:System.Data.DataTable>og tilhørende etterfølgere utstyres med data fra den angitte <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: The behavior of this method is identical to that of the <xref:System.Data.DataSet.ReadXml%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, except that in this case, data is loaded only for the current table and its descendants.
trans-unit.target: Virkemåten til denne metoden er identisk med den <xref:System.Data.DataSet.ReadXml%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden, unntatt som i dette tilfellet dataene er lastet inn bare for den gjeldende tabellen og underordnede.</xref:System.Data.DataSet.ReadXml%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ReadXml method provides a way to read either data only, or both data and schema into a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> from an XML document, whereas the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ReadXmlSchema%2A> method reads only the schema.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ReadXml gir en måte å lese data only, eller både data og skjema til en <xref:System.Data.DataTable>fra en XML-dokument, mens den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ReadXmlSchema%2A>metoden viser bare skjema.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.ReadXmlSchema%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: Note that the same is true for the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXml%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXmlSchema%2A> methods, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Merk at det samme gjelder for den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXml%2A>og <xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXmlSchema%2A>metoder, henholdsvis.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXmlSchema%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: To write XML data, or both schema and data from the `DataTable`, use the `WriteXml` method.
trans-unit.target: Lagring av XML-dataene, eller skjemaet og data fra den `DataTable`, bruker den `WriteXml` metoden.

trans-unit.source: To write just the schema, use the `WriteXmlSchema` method.
trans-unit.target: For å skrive bare skjemaet, kan du bruke den `WriteXmlSchema` metoden.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> will be thrown if a column type in the `DataRow` being read from or written to implements <xref:System.Dynamic.IDynamicMetaObjectProvider> and does not implement <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > En <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>vil bli utløst Hvis kolonnetype i den `DataRow` som lese fra eller skrive til implementerer <xref:System.Dynamic.IDynamicMetaObjectProvider>og implementerer ikke <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> </xref:System.Dynamic.IDynamicMetaObjectProvider> </xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: If an in-line schema is specified, the in-line schema is used to extend the existing relational structure prior to loading the data.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et innebygd skjema er angitt, brukes i linje-skjema til å utvide den eksisterende relasjonsdatabase strukturen før innlasting av dataene.

trans-unit.source: If there are any conflicts (for example, the same column in the same table defined with different data types) an exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er konflikter (for eksempel den samme kolonnen i den samme tabellen som er definert med forskjellige datatyper) oppstår et unntak.

trans-unit.source: If no in-line schema is specified, the relational structure is extended through inference, as necessary, according to the structure of the XML document.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen innebygde XML-skjemaet er angitt, utsettes relasjonsdata strukturen via interferens etter behov, i henhold til strukturen i XML-dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: If the schema cannot be extended through inference in order to expose all data, an exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: Hvis skjemaet ikke kan utvides til interferens for å vise alle dataene, oppstår det et unntak.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `DataSet` does not associate an XML element with its corresponding `DataColumn` or `DataTable` when legal XML characters like ("_") are escaped in the serialized XML.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I `DataSet` ikke knytte et XML-element med den tilhørende `DataColumn` eller `DataTable` når gyldig XML-tegn, for eksempel ("_") anførselstegn i serialisert XML.

trans-unit.source: The `DataSet` itself only escapes illegal XML characters in XML element names and hence can only consume the same.
trans-unit.target: Den `DataSet` selve escapes bare ugyldige XML-tegn i XML-elementnavn, og derfor kan bare bruke det samme.

trans-unit.source: When legal characters in XML element name are escaped, the element is ignored while processing.
trans-unit.target: Når gyldige tegn i XML-elementnavnet er escape-tegn, ignoreres elementet under behandling.

trans-unit.source: An object that derives from <xref:System.IO.Stream>
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som er avledet fra<xref:System.IO.Stream></xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.XmlReadMode"></xref> used to read the data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.XmlReadMode"> </xref> brukes til å lese dataene.

trans-unit.source: Reads XML schema and data into the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> using the specified <xref:System.IO.TextReader>.
trans-unit.target: Leser XML-skjema og data i den <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> ved hjelp av den angitte <xref:System.IO.TextReader>.</xref:System.IO.TextReader>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref:System.Data.DataTable> and its descendents are loaded with the data from the supplied <xref:System.IO.TextReader>.
trans-unit.target: Den gjeldende <xref:System.Data.DataTable>og tilhørende etterfølgere utstyres med data fra den angitte <xref:System.IO.TextReader>.</xref:System.IO.TextReader> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: The behavior of this method is identical to that of the <xref:System.Data.DataSet.ReadXml%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, except that in this case, data is loaded only for the current table and its descendants.
trans-unit.target: Virkemåten til denne metoden er identisk med den <xref:System.Data.DataSet.ReadXml%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden, unntatt som i dette tilfellet dataene er lastet inn bare for den gjeldende tabellen og underordnede.</xref:System.Data.DataSet.ReadXml%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ReadXml method provides a way to read either data only, or both data and schema into a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> from an XML document, whereas the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ReadXmlSchema%2A> method reads only the schema.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ReadXml gir en måte å lese data only, eller både data og skjema til en <xref:System.Data.DataTable>fra en XML-dokument, mens den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ReadXmlSchema%2A>metoden viser bare skjema.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.ReadXmlSchema%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: Note that the same is true for the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXml%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXmlSchema%2A> methods, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Merk at det samme gjelder for den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXml%2A>og <xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXmlSchema%2A>metoder, henholdsvis.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXmlSchema%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: To write XML data, or both schema and data from the `DataTable`, use the `WriteXml` method.
trans-unit.target: Lagring av XML-dataene, eller skjemaet og data fra den `DataTable`, bruker den `WriteXml` metoden.

trans-unit.source: To write just the schema, use the `WriteXmlSchema` method.
trans-unit.target: For å skrive bare skjemaet, kan du bruke den `WriteXmlSchema` metoden.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> will be thrown if a column type in the `DataRow` being read from or written to implements <xref:System.Dynamic.IDynamicMetaObjectProvider> and does not implement <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > En <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>vil bli utløst Hvis kolonnetype i den `DataRow` som lese fra eller skrive til implementerer <xref:System.Dynamic.IDynamicMetaObjectProvider>og implementerer ikke <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> </xref:System.Dynamic.IDynamicMetaObjectProvider> </xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: If an in-line schema is specified, the in-line schema is used to extend the existing relational structure prior to loading the data.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et innebygd skjema er angitt, brukes i linje-skjema til å utvide den eksisterende relasjonsdatabase strukturen før innlasting av dataene.

trans-unit.source: If there are any conflicts (for example, the same column in the same table defined with different data types) an exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er konflikter (for eksempel den samme kolonnen i den samme tabellen som er definert med forskjellige datatyper) oppstår et unntak.

trans-unit.source: If no in-line schema is specified, the relational structure is extended through inference, as necessary, according to the structure of the XML document.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen innebygde XML-skjemaet er angitt, utsettes relasjonsdata strukturen via interferens etter behov, i henhold til strukturen i XML-dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: If the schema cannot be extended through inference in order to expose all data, an exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: Hvis skjemaet ikke kan utvides til interferens for å vise alle dataene, oppstår det et unntak.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `DataSet` does not associate an XML element with its corresponding `DataColumn` or `DataTable` when legal XML characters like ("_") are escaped in the serialized XML.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I `DataSet` ikke knytte et XML-element med den tilhørende `DataColumn` eller `DataTable` når gyldig XML-tegn, for eksempel ("_") anførselstegn i serialisert XML.

trans-unit.source: The `DataSet` itself only escapes illegal XML characters in XML element names and hence can only consume the same.
trans-unit.target: Den `DataSet` selve escapes bare ugyldige XML-tegn i XML-elementnavn, og derfor kan bare bruke det samme.

trans-unit.source: When legal characters in XML element name are escaped, the element is ignored while processing.
trans-unit.target: Når gyldige tegn i XML-elementnavnet er escape-tegn, ignoreres elementet under behandling.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextReader> that will be used to read the data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IO.TextReader>som skal brukes til å lese dataene.</xref:System.IO.TextReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.XmlReadMode"></xref> used to read the data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.XmlReadMode"> </xref> brukes til å lese dataene.

trans-unit.source: Reads XML schema and data into the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> from the specified file.
trans-unit.target: Leser XML-skjema og data i den <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> fra den angitte filen.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref:System.Data.DataTable> and its descendents are loaded with the data from the file named in the supplied <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Den gjeldende <xref:System.Data.DataTable>og tilhørende etterfølgere utstyres med dataene fra filen i den angitte <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: The behavior of this method is identical to that of the <xref:System.Data.DataSet.ReadXml%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, except that in this case, data is loaded only for the current table and its descendants.
trans-unit.target: Virkemåten til denne metoden er identisk med den <xref:System.Data.DataSet.ReadXml%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden, unntatt som i dette tilfellet dataene er lastet inn bare for den gjeldende tabellen og underordnede.</xref:System.Data.DataSet.ReadXml%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: Leser en XML-skjema til den <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> ved hjelp av den angitte strømmen.

trans-unit.source: Use the ReadXmlSchema method to create the schema for a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ReadXmlSchema-metoden til å opprette skjemaet for <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: The schema includes table, relation, and constraint definitions.
trans-unit.target: Skjemaet inneholder tabell, relasjon og begrensningen definisjoner.

trans-unit.source: To write a schema to an XML document, use the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXmlSchema%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å skrive inn et skjema et XML-dokument, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXmlSchema%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXmlSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: The XML schema is interpreted according to the XSD standard.
trans-unit.target: XML-skjemaet tolkes i henhold til XSD standard.

trans-unit.source: Data corruption can occur if the msdata:DataType and the xs:type types do not match.
trans-unit.target: Ødelagte data kan forekomme hvis msdata:DataType og xs:type-typer ikke samsvarer.

trans-unit.source: No exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Bli vil utløst ingen unntak.

trans-unit.source: The `ReadXmlSchema` method is generally invoked before invoking the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ReadXml%2A> method which is used to fill the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: Den `ReadXmlSchema` metoden vanligvis kalles før du aktiverer <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ReadXml%2A>metoden som brukes til å fylle <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.ReadXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create a nested relation using XML schema, use implicit nested elements.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil opprette en nestet relasjon som bruker XML-skjemaet, kan du bruke implisitt nestede elementer.

trans-unit.source: You can also configure the nested relation to use explicit column names.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også konfigurere nestet relasjon for å bruke eksplisitt kolonnenavn.

trans-unit.source: Elements must be implicitly nested in order for the corresponding DataTables to participate in a nested relation.
trans-unit.target: Elementene må være implisitt nestet for at den tilsvarende DataTables delta i en nestet relasjon.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The way to create a nested relation using XML schema is to have implicit nested elements.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Måten å opprette en nestet relasjon som bruker XML-skjema er ha implisitt nestede elementer.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the nested relation could be re-wired, to use explicit column names.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg kan nestet relasjon på nytt kablet, til å bruke eksplisitt kolonnenavn.

trans-unit.source: It is mandatory for elements to be implicitly nested for the corresponding DataTables to participate in a nested relation.
trans-unit.target: Det er obligatorisk for elementene implisitt nestede for den tilsvarende DataTables delta i en nestet relasjon.

trans-unit.source: The TableCleared event is fired immediately after all rows have been successfully cleared but before the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Clear%2A> method returns control back to the caller.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen TableCleared aktiveres umiddelbart etter at alle rader har blitt tømt men før den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Clear%2A>metoden returnerer kontrollen til oppkalleren.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: The TableCleared event is not fired if there are any exceptions during the clear operation.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen TableCleared aktiveres ikke hvis det finnes unntak under Fjern-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName*> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable.DisplayExpression*>, if there is one as a concatenated string.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <> </> *> og <> </> *>, hvis det finnes en som en sammenkoblet streng.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable.DisplayExpression%2A> for the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.

trans-unit.source: Writes the current contents of the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> as XML using the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Skriver gjeldende innholdet i den <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> som XML med den angitte <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXml%2A> method provides a way to write either data only, or both data and schema from a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> into an XML document, whereas the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXmlSchema%2A> method writes only the schema.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXml%2A>metoden gir en måte å skrive data only, eller både data og skjema fra en <xref:System.Data.DataTable>i et XML-dokument, mens den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXmlSchema%2A>metoden skriver bare skjema.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXmlSchema%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: To write both data and schema, use one of the overloads that includes the <xref:System.Data.XmlWriteMode> parameter, and set its value to `WriteSchema`.
trans-unit.target: For å skrive data- og schema, Bruk overlastingene som inneholder den <xref:System.Data.XmlWriteMode>parameteren og sette verdien `WriteSchema`.</xref:System.Data.XmlWriteMode>

trans-unit.source: Note that the same is true for the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ReadXml%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ReadXmlSchema%2A> methods, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Merk at det samme gjelder for den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ReadXml%2A>og <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ReadXmlSchema%2A>metoder, henholdsvis.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.ReadXmlSchema%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.ReadXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: To read XML data, or both schema and data into the `DataTable`, use the `ReadXml` method.
trans-unit.target: Kan lese XML-dataene, eller skjemaet og dataene i den `DataTable`, bruker den `ReadXml` metoden.

trans-unit.source: To read just the schema, use the `ReadXmlSchema` method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan lese bare skjemaet ved bruk av `ReadXmlSchema` metoden.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> will be thrown if a column type in the `DataRow` being read from or written to implements <xref:System.Dynamic.IDynamicMetaObjectProvider> and does not implement <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > En <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>vil bli utløst Hvis kolonnetype i den `DataRow` som lese fra eller skrive til implementerer <xref:System.Dynamic.IDynamicMetaObjectProvider>og implementerer ikke <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> </xref:System.Dynamic.IDynamicMetaObjectProvider> </xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: Normally the `WriteXml` method writes the data only for the current table.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis den `WriteXml` metoden skriver dataene bare for den gjeldende tabellen.

trans-unit.source: To write the data for the current table and all of its descendant, related tables, call the method with the `writeHierarchy` parameter set to `true`.

trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXml%2A>metoden gir en måte å skrive data only, eller både data og skjema fra en <xref:System.Data.DataTable>i et XML-dokument, mens den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXmlSchema%2A>metoden skriver bare skjema.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXmlSchema%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: To write both data and schema, use one of the overloads that includes the <xref:System.Data.XmlWriteMode> parameter, and set its value to `WriteSchema`.
trans-unit.target: For å skrive data- og schema, Bruk overlastingene som inneholder den <xref:System.Data.XmlWriteMode>parameteren og sette verdien `WriteSchema`.</xref:System.Data.XmlWriteMode>

trans-unit.source: Note that the same is true for the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ReadXml%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ReadXmlSchema%2A> methods, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Merk at det samme gjelder for den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ReadXml%2A>og <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ReadXmlSchema%2A>metoder, henholdsvis.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.ReadXmlSchema%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.ReadXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: To read XML data, or both schema and data into the `DataTable`, use the `ReadXml` method.
trans-unit.target: Kan lese XML-dataene, eller skjemaet og dataene i den `DataTable`, bruker den `ReadXml` metoden.

trans-unit.source: To read just the schema, use the `ReadXmlSchema` method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan lese bare skjemaet ved bruk av `ReadXmlSchema` metoden.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> will be thrown if a column type in the `DataRow` being read from or written to implements <xref:System.Dynamic.IDynamicMetaObjectProvider> and does not implement <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > En <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>vil bli utløst Hvis kolonnetype i den `DataRow` som lese fra eller skrive til implementerer <xref:System.Dynamic.IDynamicMetaObjectProvider>og implementerer ikke <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> </xref:System.Dynamic.IDynamicMetaObjectProvider> </xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> used to write the document.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>brukes til å skrive dokumentet.</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.XmlWriteMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Data.XmlWriteMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Writes the current contents of the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> as XML using the specified file.
trans-unit.target: Skriver gjeldende innholdet i den <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> som XML med den angitte filen.

trans-unit.source: To save the data for the table and all its descendants, set the writeHierarchy parameter to .
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil lagre dataene for tabellen og alle underordnede, angitt i writeHierarchy parameter .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXml%2A> method provides a way to write either data only, or both data and schema from a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> into an XML document, whereas the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXmlSchema%2A> method writes only the schema.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXml%2A>metoden gir en måte å skrive data only, eller både data og skjema fra en <xref:System.Data.DataTable>i et XML-dokument, mens den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXmlSchema%2A>metoden skriver bare skjema.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXmlSchema%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: To write both data and schema, use one of the overloads that includes the <xref:System.Data.XmlWriteMode> parameter, and set its value to `WriteSchema`.
trans-unit.target: For å skrive data- og schema, Bruk overlastingene som inneholder den <xref:System.Data.XmlWriteMode>parameteren og sette verdien `WriteSchema`.</xref:System.Data.XmlWriteMode>

trans-unit.source: Note that the same is true for the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ReadXml%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ReadXmlSchema%2A> methods, respectively.

trans-unit.source: To read XML data, or both schema and data into the `DataTable`, use the `ReadXml` method.
trans-unit.target: Kan lese XML-dataene, eller skjemaet og dataene i den `DataTable`, bruker den `ReadXml` metoden.

trans-unit.source: To read just the schema, use the `ReadXmlSchema` method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan lese bare skjemaet ved bruk av `ReadXmlSchema` metoden.

trans-unit.source: Normally the `WriteXml` method writes the data only for the current table.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis den `WriteXml` metoden skriver dataene bare for den gjeldende tabellen.

trans-unit.source: To write the data for the current table and all of its descendant, related tables, call the method with the `writeHierarchy` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Å skrive data for den gjeldende tabellen, og alle etterkommer, relaterte tabeller, kalle metoden med den `writeHierarchy` parameteren satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> will be thrown if a column type in the `DataRow` being read from or written to implements <xref:System.Dynamic.IDynamicMetaObjectProvider> and does not implement <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable>.

trans-unit.source: The file to which to write the XML data.
trans-unit.target: Filen du vil skrive XML-dataene.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, write the contents of the current table and all its descendants.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, skrive til innholdet i den gjeldende tabellen og alle underordnede.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> (the default value), write the data for the current table only.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> (standardverdien) skrive data for den gjeldende tabellen.

trans-unit.source: Writes the current data, and optionally the schema, for the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> using the specified file and <xref href="System.Data.XmlWriteMode"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXml%2A> method provides a way to write either data only, or both data and schema from a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> into an XML document, whereas the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXmlSchema%2A> method writes only the schema.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXml%2A>metoden gir en måte å skrive data only, eller både data og skjema fra en <xref:System.Data.DataTable>i et XML-dokument, mens den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXmlSchema%2A>metoden skriver bare skjema.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXmlSchema%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: To write both data and schema, use one of the overloads that includes the <xref:System.Data.XmlWriteMode> parameter, and set its value to `WriteSchema`.
trans-unit.target: For å skrive data- og schema, Bruk overlastingene som inneholder den <xref:System.Data.XmlWriteMode>parameteren og sette verdien `WriteSchema`.</xref:System.Data.XmlWriteMode>

trans-unit.source: Note that the same is true for the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ReadXml%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ReadXmlSchema%2A> methods, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Merk at det samme gjelder for den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ReadXml%2A>og <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ReadXmlSchema%2A>metoder, henholdsvis.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.ReadXmlSchema%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.ReadXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: To read XML data, or both schema and data into the `DataTable`, use the `ReadXml` method.

trans-unit.source: To read just the schema, use the `ReadXmlSchema` method.

trans-unit.source: Normally, the `WriteXml` method saves data only for the current table.

trans-unit.target: For å skrive data til en XML-dokumentet, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXml%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.WriteXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: Normally the `WriteXmlSchema` method writes the schema only for the current table.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis den `WriteXmlSchema` metoden skriver skjemaet bare for den gjeldende tabellen.

trans-unit.source: To write the schema for the current table and its entire descendant, related tables, call the method with the `writeHierarchy` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: For å skrive inn skjemaet for den gjeldende tabellen og hele underordnede, relaterte tabellene, kan du kalle metoden med den `writeHierarchy` parameteren satt til `true`.
